ExploreFact.Text: Lush and green. The gravity here is higher than what I'm used to.

RumorFact.Text: There's a flat space nestled amongst the hills a short distance from the <color=orange>North Pole</color> of <color=orange>Spruce Caboose</color>.

ExploreFact.Text: A flat space nestled amongst the hills.
<color=lightblue>Enji</color> crash-landed here, but cleaned up the crash site. They're covering their tracks.
There's a scroll on top of one of the hills

AltText.Text: A scroll with <color=lightblue>Enji's</color> idea for constructing a space train was found atop one of the hills.

ExploreFact.Text: <color=lightblue>Enji</color> suspected that the <color=orange>derelict vessel</color> at the center of all these systems might contain additional warp cores.
A warp reciever linked to the <color=orange>derelict vessel</color> was moved from here to the train.

While trying to set up warp pads between <color=orange>Spruce Caboose</color> and <color=orange>Locomocean</color>, <color=lightblue>Enji</color> ended up losing a <color=orange>white hole</color> warp core to the sea.
<color=lightblue>Enji</color> used spare warp core instead. They theorized that the dropped core might have ended up <color=orange>buried in the sand</color> on the <color=orange>South Pole</color>.
The warp pad here seems to be missing a <color=orange>black hole</color> warp core.
The warp core I found fit perfectly!

RumorFact.Text: <color=lightblue>Enji</color> suspected that the <color=orange>derelict vessel</color> at the center of all these systems might contain additional warp cores.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a <color=orange>black hole</color> warp core on the <color=orange>derelict vessel</color>.
<color=lightblue>Enji</color> proposed an idea for constructing a train capable of transporting not just its passengers, but entire groups of planets!
It appears the idea was met with some skepticism.

<color=lightblue>Enji</color> decided to quietly leave their clan to attempt working alone. They needed planets that were small enough for their specifications and at least one of them needed to have <color=lightblue>Ghost Matter</color>.

A <color=orange>One-Way Signal Blocker</color> was set up to prevent <color=lightblue>Enji's</color> clan from getting in the way while also allowing <color=lightblue>Enji</color> know how to get back to them after the train was completed.
<color=lightblue>Enji</color> hoped that this would provide <color=yellow>two weeks</color> to complete the train.

RumorFact.Text: There's a hollowed out pillar on the equator of <color=orange>Spruce Caboose</color>.

ExploreFact.Text: A hollowed out pillar. It seems all entrances are covered with <color=lightblue>Ghost Matter</color>.
I can see a deep pit of water within <color=orange>Spruce Caboose</color>.

<color=lightblue>Enji</color> discovered that if you're <color=orange>drenched with water</color>, you are temporarily immune to the effects <color=lightblue>Ghost Matter</color> for roughly <color=orange>one minute</color>.
<color=lightblue>Enji</color> also learned the hard way that <color=orange>water quickly vaporizes</color> in the vacuum of space.

RumorFact.Text: There's a hollow mountain on the equator of <color=orange>Spruce Caboose</color>.

ExploreFact.Text: A hollowed mountain. There's <color=lightblue>Ghost Matter</color> within.
I can see a platform up high in the mountain.

AltText.Text: I was able to reach a platform that was up high in the mountain.

RumorFact.Text: I can hear something coming from high up in the mountain.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a signal on <color=orange>Spruce Caboose</color>.

AltText.Text: I found a signal on <color=orange>Spruce Caboose</color> leading to a <color=orange>Coordinate Relay</color>.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a <color=orange>One-Way Signal Blocker</color>. It appears to have some issues with its function. An error message reads the following:
<color=red>ERROR</color>: Scheduled automatic cessation of <color=orange>One-Way Signal Blocker</color> following user inputed time of <color=yellow>three weeks</color> has failed.
There's a scroll ontop of the platform.

AltText.Text: A scroll detailing <color=lightblue>Enji's</color> plan was found here.

RumorFact.Text: Coordinates leading to <color=lightblue>Enji's</color> clan are availible somewhere on <color=orange>Spruce Caboose</color>.
I found a signal on <color=orange>Spruce Caboose</color>.

AltText.Text: I found a signal on <color=orange>Spruce Caboose</color> leading to a <color=orange>Coordinate Relay</color>.

ExploreFact.Text: I managed to find a set of <color=orange>coordinates</color>!
